channel.title: The Truth Will Make You Free
channel.description: Study the Bible through in-depth articles on fundamental truths, the gospel, and prophecy. Discover how Scripture is more relevant than ever to our lives today.

item.title: Keys to Effective Prayer
item.description: Prayer is foundational to the Christian walk. Are there biblical principles that can make our prayers more effective?

item.title: Christian Standards
item.description: Discover why followers of Christ are called to live differently and what that means practically.

item.title: Surrendering the Fight
item.description: Knowingly or unknowingly, every person on earth is waging a losing war, and surrender is the only way out.

item.title: Finances, God’s Way
item.description: Financial investment advice in the Bible? Discover God’s plan for managing our finances wisely.

item.title: The Gift of Prophecy
item.description: False prophets are on the rise. Learn how to tell the difference between a false and a true prophet of God.

item.title: Why Get Baptized?
item.description: Explore what a public commitment to Christ looks like, what it means, and why it matters.

item.title: The Holy Spirit
item.description: He might be the least understood member of the Godhead, but He plays a crucial role in every person’s salvation.

item.title: How to Identify a Cult?
item.description: Is it possible to be part of a cult and not know it? Discover it’s identifying marks to avoid being fooled.

item.title: The 2,300 Day Prophecy
item.description: A prophecy that stretches into the 19th century with implications for people living today. Are you aware of it?

item.title: The Gospel in the Sanctuary
item.description: First introduced to Moses on Mount Sinai, the sanctuary offers deep insights into God’s plan of salvation.

item.title: God’s Remnant Church
item.description: God has a remnant church that will remain loyal to Him till the end. What are its identifying marks?

item.title: Are You Part of Babylon?
item.description: Revelation warns about it, and the plagues are poured out on it. What does Babylon represent?

item.title: USA in Bible Prophecy
item.description: Will the nation that has become a beacon of freedom to the world continue to uphold the cause of liberty?

item.title: The Mark of the Beast
item.description: Is it a barcode? A microchip perhaps? Discover what the Bible really says about this misunderstood mark.

item.title: Who Is the Antichrist?
item.description: Discover the truth about the entity that places itself in place of, and in opposition to, Christ Himself.

item.title: What Will Heaven Be Like?
item.description: Heaven is real, accessible to all, and more glorious than anything we have seen, heard, or imagined.

item.title: Is Hell Forever?
item.description: Will a just and loving God torture people in a never ending hell for only a lifetime of sin?

item.title: 1,000 Years of Peace
item.description: Find out who stays behind and what happens on earth, as well as in heaven, during the millennium.

item.title: Are the Dead Really Dead?
item.description: It started with a lie in the Garden of Eden, and it’s still being told today. Will you be fooled?

item.title: God’s Health Plan
item.description: Jesus wants to redeem me from sin. Does He have a plan to redeem my health as well?

item.title: Victory Over Sin
item.description: Is it possible to have victory over the power of sin, or is forgiveness of sin all there is to salvation?

item.title: Walking in Faith
item.description: Faith is a central theme in the Bible, but what is it really? Does God want us to have blind faith?

item.title: Keeping the Sabbath
item.description: Discover biblical guidance on keeping God’s seventh-day Sabbath the way He intended it.

item.title: God’s Law Changed
item.description: The Bible prophesied a power would arise that would attempt to change God’s law. Has this happened?

item.title: First Day Texts
item.description: Does the Bible have evidence of the Sabbath being changed? Explore the texts mentioning the first day to find out.

item.title: God’s Holy Rest Day
item.description: A day was set apart by God on the first week of creation. Why? Does it still have significance today?

item.title: God’s Law of Love
item.description: The book of James calls it the royal law of liberty. Can it even be kept? Or is obedience legalism?

item.title: Will I Be Judged?
item.description: Am I my own ruler? Or am I responsible to a higher Authority for the way I live my life?

item.title: Signs of Christ’s Coming
item.description: How close are we to the most glorious event in earth’s history? Do you know the signs?

item.title: How Will Christ Come?
item.description: Will His coming be secret, or does the Bible tell a different story? The truth may shock you.

item.title: Europe’s Future Revealed
item.description: Delve into a remarkable prophecy about the rise and fall of kingdoms. What does the future hold for Europe?

item.title: Receiving Forgiveness
item.description: Confession and forgiveness of sins is central to the plan of salvation. Have you experienced it?

item.title: How Can I Be Saved?
item.description: Because all have sinned, all are sitting on death row, whether we realize it or not. There is hope though! But only if I allow Jesus to intervene.

item.title: Divinity of Christ
item.description: Is Jesus God, or was He just a prophet? What evidence does the Bible give regarding His divinity?

item.title: Messianic Prophecies
item.description: Learn about the astounding Old Testament prophecies of the Messiah that were fulfilled in the life of Jesus.

item.title: Origin of Evil
item.description: If God is in control, why is there so much evil in the world? How did it begin, and when will it end?

item.title: What Is God Like?
item.description: The amount of misconceptions and flat out lies about God is astounding. What is the truth about His character?

item.title: Can I Trust the Bible?
item.description: Is the Bible a fable, or is it the most trustworthy document we have ever possessed?
